textBeforeTable: Scouting Audibles Bio Videos Statistics Updates For just the third time in the last 20 years, no Colorado football players were selected in the 2010 NFL Draft. Since the draft concluded on Saturday, however, four Buffs have been signed on with an NFL team as a free agent.[details] The Latest: No Buffaloes selected in draft — 4/26/2010   Michael Adkins Cade Apsay Vincent Ariva Jaleel Awini Chidobe Awuzie Jered Bell Brian Boatman Bryce Bobo Ed Caldwell Shane Callahan Jordan Carrell Connor Center Timothy Coleman Lance Cottrell Kenneth Crawley Connor Darby Elijah Dunston Kyle Evans Shay Fields John Finch Will Fischer-Colbrie Jase Franke George Frazier Rick Gamboa Ty Gangi Jordan Gehrke Jimmie Gilbert Addison Gillam Diego Gonzalez Chris Graham Garrett Gregory Devyn Grimes Joseph Hall Terran Hasselbach Tyler Henington Chris Hill Aaron Howard Jonathan Huckins
